DOC.brief_summary: This study aim investigate pharmacokinetic/pharmacodynamic drug-drug interaction pyrimethamine metformin IR oral administration healthy male volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Investigate Pharmacokinetic/Pharmacodynamic Drug-Drug Interaction Pyrimethamine Metformin IR
DOC.criteria: healthy male subject age 20 45 screen A body weight range 50 kg ( inclusive ) 100 kg ( inclusive ) ideal body weight range + 25 % subject decide participate voluntarily write informed consent form subject clinically significant disease cardiovascular , respiratory , renal , endocrinological , hematological , gastrointestinal , neurological ( central nervous system ) , psychiatric disorder malignant tumor Subject judge eligible study participation investigator .
